content: Has to be Elon Musk. I’ve long thought he looked like a Bond villain, plus his projects- electric cars, solar panels, private space exploration- are classic Bond villain pursuits where they think they’re helping humanity because no one else knows how. he’s like 20 years from unveiling his “culling” to reduce the earth’s population to save it. (not saying electric cars and solar power aren’t good) It also doesn’t help that he looks like Malcom Merlyn: https://static5.comicvine.com/uploads/original/10/104544/5019610-9827494353-latest
